amendment.description: Amendment increases funding, by offset, for the Office of Immigration and Customs Enforcement by $9,100,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce appropriation for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by $10,400,000, and increase appropriation for the Office of Immigration and Customs Enforcement by $9,100,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Drake amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 286 - 127 (Roll no. 469).
